description: A Zero Turn Riding Mower is required. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is March 31, 2024.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Zero Turn Riding Mower Procurement Notice

#### Solicitation Reference Number: 01R11-24-C066

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is soliciting bids for the procurement of three (3) zero-turn riding mowers.

#### Tender Description

The successful supplier will provide zero-turn riding mowers to support the department's agricultural operations. Delivery of the goods is expected by March 31, 2024.

#### Eligibility Criteria

Only suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18MOWR/B are eligible to participate in this bid solicitation process. Suppliers wishing to pre-qualify for this RFSA may visit the Government of Canada's procurement website at https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-75734.

#### Tender Process

This bid solicitation process is open for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days from the date of publication. Bidders can request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within fifteen (15) working days from the date of notification of bid results.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Camille Sobczak, Procurement Officer, at (204) 430-5426 or camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca.

#### Notice Type and Method

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA) using competitive and selective tendering. The selection criteria is lowest price.

#### procurement Category

This procurement falls under the Goods category.

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

The regions of opportunity and delivery for this procurement are:

* Canada
* Saskatoon, Saskatchewan
* Melfort, Saskatchewan
* Scott, Saskatchewan

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreements.

#### Procurement Office Contact Information

Procurement Office
400-303 Main Street
Winnipeg, Manitoba
R3C 3G7
Canada

Phone: (204) 430-5426
Email: camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca
